name: Selective Invisibility
text: Upon casting this spell, you turn invisible, as per the invisibility spell, and you choose a second target. That creature can still see you as though you were not invisible, and you can attack that creature without ending the invisibility effect on you. However, if you attack any other creature, this spell ends. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can attack any of the affected creatures without ending the spell.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料/法器（三个半透明的鹅卵石）
text_zh: 在施放这种法术之后，你会变得隐形，就像受到隐形术一样，而你还要选择第二个目标。这个生物将仍然可以看到你，就像你不是隐形的一样，你可以攻击该生物而不结束对你的隐形效果。但是，如果你攻击其他生物，这个法术就会结束。如果你多次施放这个法术，你可以攻击任何受影响的生物，同时不结束法术。
